imdb.plot outline: First-ever Digital Food Reality Competition judged by culinary masters like Sanjeev Kapoor, Saransh Goila and Amrita Raichand. Across 4 rounds, home chefs from different parts of the country compete in thrilling cook-offs to win the prestigious title. The competition aims to bring glory to the culinary talent of the Home-chefs whose recipes and skills were till now confined to the four walls of their kitchen.
imdb.title: India's Digital Chef
plot: First-ever Digital Food Reality Competition judged by culinary masters like Sanjeev Kapoor, Saransh Goila and Amrita Raichand. Across 4 rounds, home chefs from different parts of the country compete in thrilling cook-offs to win the prestigious title. The competition aims to bring glory to the culinary talent of the Home-chefs whose recipes and skills were till now confined to the four walls of their kitchen.::One Digital Entertainment.
